snp2.3:1.3: but not following up in deeds—
snp2.3:1.4: know they’re not on your side.
snp2.3:2.1: Some say nice things to their friends
snp2.3:3.3: One on whom you rest, like a child on the breast,
snp2.3:3.4: is a true friend, not split from you by others.
snp2.3:4.1: One whose reward is the fruit
snp2.3:4.2: of bearing the burden of service
snp2.3:5.1: One who has drunk the nectar of seclusion
snp2.3:5.3: free of stress, free of evil,
snp2.3:5.4: drinks the joyous nectar of Dhamma.
